@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Attempt to log a warning about an error that occurred inside a script

Implementation is browser-specific and can be improved to handle more browsers

@param.name: @param
@param.body: object {any} an object that is the context of the log message
@param.description: an object that is the context of the log message

@param.name: @param
@param.body: error {Error} exception thrown while running script
